nodes.text: Leric Schmireland was a male explorer affiliated with the University of Coruscant. Around 532 BBY, Schmireland was commissioned by the Galactic Republic to catalogue planets, departing Coruscant with a team. He never returned to Coruscant, but his messenger droids continued to appear at the university to deliver reports into the High Republic Era. Avon Starros considered the Schmireland almanac to be mostly useless as it contained facts about worlds no one had any reason to visit, but it was used by her droid J-6 to identify the jungle moon she and several others had become stranded on as Wevo.
